head_commit.message:
VPN-3331 - Crash reporting for all!  (#7176)

* Fetch Crash Report info from Guardian

* Enable Crashreporting for Linux

* Add lib-curl

* Make sure that we are using our transport

* Make sure that we recursively checkout submodules

* Fix test code

* Ohhh okay parcour

* Mhh, it does not link to sentry, why tho

* okay that did not do the trick

* okay that did not do the trick v2

* IS IT THE NEWLINE?!

* Okay make sure we are setting the right args

* try to add all lib folders

* is that whole branch not executed?

* Okay i think i know what i need to do

* Add missing package

* Fix functional testing

* Let's not actually enable the crashreporting code, unless we test that

* Okay, maybe it's something with the cmake deps?

* Oh i give up, let's just not compile that piece of code for unit tests

* Remove Moc, we now use the real thing

* Pass Build type down to sentry subbuild

* Fix build type

* Smol cleanup

* Update src/shared/tasks/sentryconfig/tasksentryconfig.cpp

Co-authored-by: Beatriz Rizental <beatriz.rizental@gmail.com>

* remove that

* Update src/shared/sentry/sentryadapter.cpp

Co-authored-by: Gela <gela@mozilla.com>

* Update src/shared/tasks/sentry/tasksentry.cpp

Co-authored-by: Gela <gela@mozilla.com>

* Update src/shared/sentry/sentryadapter.cpp

Co-authored-by: Gela <gela@mozilla.com>

* Update dev docs

* move init check

* Address sentryadapter.cpp feedback

* remove stale comment

* Address tasksentry feedback

* Address tasksentryconfig feedback

* Reset sentryconfig on logout

---------

Co-authored-by: Beatriz Rizental <beatriz.rizental@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: Gela <gela@mozilla.com>

head_commit.message:
Bump click from 8.1.3 to 8.1.5 (#7534)

Bumps [click](https://github.com/pallets/click) from 8.1.3 to 8.1.5.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/pallets/click/releases)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/pallets/click/blob/8.1.5/CHANGES.rst)
- [Commits](https://github.com/pallets/click/compare/8.1.3...8.1.5)

---
updated-dependencies:
- dependency-name: click
  dependency-type: direct:production
  update-type: version-update:semver-patch
...

Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] <support@github.com>
Co-authored-by: dependabot[bot] <49699333+dependabot[bot]@users.noreply.github.com>
